post.author: wal
post.body: Im trying to change the colour of the hellknight dissolve texture but if I change the dds I get this in the console magic ! = dds ' If I change the tga the hellknight just vanishes a few seconds after being killed. I've changed the colour of other textures before and it's worked fine. Is there somthing different with the dissolve textures?

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
I suspect when you changed the image file, you stripped it of the alpha channel needed for the burn away effect to work properly.

Read over the information here...

http://www.modwiki.net/wiki/TGA_%28file_format%29

It may apply to you.

post.author: wal
post.body: Thanx Rich. When I edited the image, its size went down! So I think you were spot on as usual. I've downloaded gimp because it's free but havn't tried it yet. I hope it can do alpha channels.

post.author: wal
post.body: Okay, that worked for the dissolve texture But I also wanna change the colour of a dds texture.
